skills.name: Create Astro
skills.pattern:
npm create astro@latest my-app
cd my-app && npm run dev

skills.name: Project Structure
skills.pattern:
src/
  pages/       # File-based routing
  components/  # Astro/React/Vue/Svelte components
  layouts/     # Page layouts
  content/     # Content collections
  styles/      # Global styles
public/        # Static assets
astro.config.mjs

skills.name: Page Component
Astro Component
Layout
skills.pattern:
---
// src/layouts/Layout.astro
interface Props {
  title: string;
}

const { title } = Astro.props;
---

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <title>{title}</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <slot />  <!-- Child content -->
  </body>
</html>

skills.name: File Routing
Dynamic Routes
Content Collections
Query Content
Render Content
Client Islands
skills.pattern:
---
import Counter from '../components/Counter.jsx';
---

<!-- No JS -->
<Counter />

<!-- Hydrate on load -->
<Counter client:load />

<!-- Hydrate when visible -->
<Counter client:visible />

<!-- Hydrate when idle -->
<Counter client:idle />

<!-- Hydrate on media query -->
<Counter client:media="(max-width: 768px)" />
